backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing user profiles, 1:1 chat threads, message storage, access control checks, and query/update methods for chats and profiles.
feature_evidence.json: Feature-to-file mapping report listing implemented features, related files, components, and confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten summaries describing the purpose and behavior of various frontend files in the project.
frontend/index.css: Tailwind base stylesheet defining OKLCH color variables, light/dark theme values, and global UI theming.
frontend/index.html: Simple HTML entry point loading the React app via main.tsx and setting app metadata.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component managing authentication, routing between screens, theme provider, and profile setup flow.
frontend/src/components/AppHeader.tsx: Header bar with navigation, theme toggle, profile button, and logout logic.
frontend/src/components/ChatThreadHeader: Thread header showing the other user's profile info, avatar initials, and shortened principal ID.
frontend/src/components/ChatThreadItem.t: Chat list item displaying user details, unread badge, last activity time, and click navigation behavior.
frontend/src/components/MessageBubble.ts: Displays a chat message bubble styled based on sender and shows a formatted timestamp.
Provides a textarea and send button for composing messages with validation and submit handling.
frontend/src/components/ProfileSetupDial: Modal dialog for entering and saving a user's display name during initial setup.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Creates and manages a backend actor tied to the current identity and refreshes dependent queries when it changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Provides authentication state and logic using Internet Identity, exposing identity, login, and logout.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines React Query hooks for profiles, chats, messages, and sending messages using the backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS setup with light/dark theme variables and base typography styling.
frontend/src/lib/validation.ts: Contains validation helpers for message content and display names with length checks.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Bootstraps the app with React Query and Internet Identity providers and renders the root component.
frontend/src/screens/ChatListScreen.tsx: Displays the user's chat list and provides a dialog to start new chats by entering a Principal ID.
frontend/src/screens/ChatThreadScreen.ts: Displays a message thread, loads and marks messages as read, auto-scrolls, and renders bubbles plus a composer.
frontend/src/screens/ProfileScreen.tsx: Shows and edits the user's display name and principal ID with save and copy functionality.
frontend/src/screens/SignInScreen.tsx: Renders a branded sign‑in page using Internet Identity with a simple login button.
frontend/src/utils/urlParams.ts: Provides helpers for reading URL params, persisting them in sessionStorage, and cleaning them from the URL hash.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind theme extensions, colors, animations, and plugins for the app’s UI.
project_state.json: Stores project metadata, feature list, requirements, and branding/image guidelines for the Private Chat app.
